name: GP Solutions
description:
GP Solutions is an established European software development house with a proven track record of delivering exceptional quality in custom software development, IT consulting and support.
The Headquarters of GP Solutions is located in Munich, Germany, the Sales Office is in Miami Beach, USA and the Development Center is in Minsk, Belarus.
Highlights:
•    More than 12 years of experience in software development 
•    More than 100 talented IT-professionals 

•    More than 350 successful IT-projects 
Expertise:
•    Custom Software Development
•    Software Product Development
•    Software Testing & QA
•    Dedicated development Centers
